name: Bob'n Weavin' Ultimate Boxing Tournament
description:
HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO BOB AND WEAVE YOUR WAY TO THE TOP?

Made in under 48 hours for the KU Golden Bear Spring 2023 Game Jam

Choose from 4 different playable characters!

Face off against your opponents and shoot for the top!

Original music by Gemini

Many of the tracks here are also featured in LRPG and Bebder Game, other games which I am involved in.

Many assets used are stock RPG Maker MZ assets.

Bebder, The Advisor, and The Employee are characters from Bebder Game.

Bebder Game is developed by kittehfreak, with help from Avaddon, CT Zeal, and myself, as well as many others.

LRPG is a collaborative effort with the entire CNT dev team, led by Daji and myself.

Bebder is a parody of Bender from Futurama.
